body: This should be closed as it has been implemented: ``` atat:~ andrew$ curl -v golang.org * Rebuilt URL to: golang.org/ * Trying 74.125.22.141... * Connected to golang.org (74.125.22.141) port 80 (#0) > GET / HTTP/1.1 > Host: golang.org > User-Agent: curl/7.43.0 > Accept: */* > < HTTP/1.1 302 Found < Location: https://golang.org/ < Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 < Date: Wed, 25 Nov 2015 17:59:18 GMT < Server: Google Frontend < Content-Length: 42 < Found. * Connection #0 to host golang.org left intact ```
